oai_dc:dc.dc:title: UCV reunion coat and pants in shadow box
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: United Confederate Veterans coat with Tenn. State seal buttons and a Southern Cross of Honor of Pvt. James McGonnigal, Co. F, Maney's 1st Tenn. Inf. Regt., CSA. McGonnigal worked for the Nashville and Chattanooga Railroad Shops before the war. In early; 1862 he was detached from his regiment and spent the war working on the railroad for the Confederate Army. He was paroled at Augusta, Geo. in 1865. After the war he again worked for the Nash. and Chatt. and was a member of Co. B, UCV. He died in 1918.
